snippet: The government charged the human rights activist Leyla Yunus and her husband with a variety of crimes and ordered Ms. Yunus to be detained for three months before her trial.
abstract: Leyla Yunus, prominent human rights activist in Azerbaijan, is charged with with treason, tax evasion, running an illegal business and other crimes and jailed for three months pending trial.
lead_paragraph: The government charged the human rights activist Leyla Yunus and her husband with a variety of crimes and ordered Ms. Yunus to be detained for three months before her trial.

headline.main: Prominent Activist Charged With Treason in Azerbaijan

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
